original: Paṭṭhānapakaraṇa
analyzed: paṭṭhāna pakaraṇa

original: Dhammapaccanīyānuloma (4), Dukatikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (3)
analyzed: dhamma paccanīya anuloma duka tika paṭṭhāna pāḷi

original: 21.13. Mahantaraduka, Kusalattika
analyzed: mahantaraduka kusalattika

original: Nasārammaṇaṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā sārammaṇo kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
analyzed: na sa ārammaṇam na kusalam dhammam paccayā sa ārammaṇaḥ kusalaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā ekam pe avigate eka

original: Nasārammaṇaṁ naakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā sārammaṇo akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
analyzed: na sa ārammaṇam na akusalam dhammam paccayā sa ārammaṇaḥ akusalaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā ekam pe avigate eka

original: Naanārammaṇaṁ naabyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca anārammaṇo abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekaṁ, adhipatiyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
analyzed: na anārammaṇam na abyākatam dhammam paṭicca anārammaṇaḥ abyākataḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā eka adhipatiyā ekam pe avigate eka

original: Nocittaṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā citto kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: no cittam na kusalam dhammam paccayā cittaḥ kusalaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi. (Naakusale tīṇi. Naabyākate tīṇi. Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi na akusale tīṇi na abyākate tīṇi

original: Nacetasikaṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā cetasiko kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na cetasikam na kusalam dhammam paccayā cetasikaḥ kusalaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi

original: Nacittasampayuttaṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā cittasampayutto kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na citta sampayuttam na kusalam dhammam paccayā citta sampayuttaḥ kusalaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
analyzed: ekam pe avigate eka

original: Nacittasaṁsaṭṭhaṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā cittasaṁsaṭṭho kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na citta sasaṭṭham na kusalam dhammam paccayā citta sasaṭṭhaḥ kusalaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
analyzed: ekam pe avigate eka

original: Nacittasamuṭṭhānaṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā cittasamuṭṭhāno kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na citta samuṭṭhānam na kusalam dhammam paccayā citta samuṭṭhānaḥ kusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi

original: Nacittasahabhuṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā cittasahabhū kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na citta sahabhum na kusalam dhammam paccayā citta sahabhū kusalaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi

original: Nacittānuparivattiṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā cittānuparivattī kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na citta anuparivattim na kusalam dhammam paccayā citta anuparivattī kusalaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi

original: Nacittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānaṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na citta sasaṭṭha samuṭṭhānam na kusalam dhammam paccayā citta sasaṭṭha samuṭṭhānaḥ kusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi

original: Nacittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānasahabhuṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānasahabhū kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na citta sasaṭṭha samuṭṭhāna sahabhum na kusalam dhammam paccayā citta sasaṭṭha samuṭṭhāna sahabhū kusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta

original: Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi

original: Nacittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānānuparivattiṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānānuparivattī kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na citta sa saṭṭha samuṭṭhāna anuparivattim na kusalam dhammam paccayā citta sa saṭṭha samuṭṭhāna anuparivattī kusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi

original: Naajjhattikaṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā ajjhattiko kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na ajjhattikam na kusalam dhammam paccayā ajjhattikaḥ kusalaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi

original: Nanoupādā nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā noupādā kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na no upādā na kusalam dhammam paccayā no upādā kusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
analyzed: ekam pe avigate eka

original: Naanupādinnaṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā anupādinno kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na anupādinnam na kusalam dhammam paccayā anupādinnaḥ kusalaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
analyzed: ekam pe avigate eka
